an10.174:1: "Pāṇātipātampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:2: Adinnādānampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:3: Kāmesumicchācārampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:4: Musāvādampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:5: Pisuṇavācampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:6: Pharusavācampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:7: Samphappalāpampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:8: Abhijjhampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:9: Byāpādampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
an10.174:10: Micchādiṭṭhimpāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tividhaṁ vadāmi – lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
